sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"符合，一致"之意。
means: agree ：侧重指经过比较后的所有主要部分均和谐一致，无冲突和矛盾。
accord ：着重指性格、精神、语气或质量等方面的完全一致。
coincide ：多用于指观点、判断、愿望、利益或兴趣的一致或相符。偶尔用于人，强调意见或观点完全相同。
conform ：强调在形状、性格以及主要特点等方面的相似或一致。
correspond ：指在进行比较时，两个事物在某一个重要方面或细节上互相匹配、一致。

sentence.Network_en: A referendum next year would coincide explosively with the election campaign.
sentence.Network_cn: 明年的全民公决将和竞选活动同时进行，届时局势会十分紧张。

sentence.Network_en: It's a pity our trips to New York don't coincide.
sentence.Network_cn: 真遗憾我们不能同一时间去纽约旅行。

sentence.Network_en: His tastes and habits coincide with those of his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的爱好跟习惯恰好和他的妻子相同.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... Cohere 附着；粘着 Coincide 一致，符合，巧合 Coordinate 协调：同等的.
重字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 重光〖 seethelightoncemore〗 重合〖 coincide〗 重婚〖 bigamy〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （accident 事故＋ ） coincide 巧合；同时发生 （cand 白，光→.
2013考研英语核心词汇_百度文库 ... coin 硬币，钱币，金属货币 coincide 相符，相一致 collapse 倒坍，崩溃，瓦.

list.abs: 六级通过必备——六级高频词组汇总_新东方网 ... catch on 理解，受欢迎 coincide with 与……相符 come out 出现，出版，发表，结 …
四字格翻译汇总 ... 当务之急 urgent;imminent 不谋而合 coincide with 莘莘学子 students.
coincidence adder 符合加法器coincidence amplifier 重合放大器coincidence analyser 重合分析仪
accessories 附件accidental coincidence 偶然符合accidental degeneracy 偶然退化
coincidence boundary 重合边界coincidence method 符合法cokability 成焦性

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (in the sense 'occupy the same space'): from medieval Latin coincidere, from co- 'together with' + incidere 'fall upon or into'

entry.def: If one event coincides with another, they happen at the same time.

example.ex: The exhibition coincides with the 50th anniversary of his death...
example.tran: 展览恰好在他逝世50周年之际举行。

example.ex: Although his mental illness had coincided with his war service it had not been caused by it...
example.tran: 虽然他的精神病刚好在他参战期间发作，但并不是由此引起的。

entry.def: If the ideas or interests of two or more people coincide, they are the same.

example.ex: The kids' views on life don't always coincide, but they're not afraid of voicing their opinions...
example.tran: 孩子们的人生观并不总是一致，但他们敢于表达自己的观点。

example.ex: ...a case in which public and private interests coincide...
example.tran: 一个公众利益和私人利益一致的例子

auth_sentence.content: Low VIX readings tend to coincide with market rallies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Low VIX readings tend to coincide with market rallies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Low VIX readings tend to coincide with market rallies.

auth_sentence.content: These climatic regions rarely coincide with state boundaries.
auth_sentence.res_content: These climatic regions rarely coincide with state boundaries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These climatic regions rarely coincide with state boundaries.

auth_sentence.content: Green turtles time their egg-laying to coincide with one another.
auth_sentence.res_content: Green turtles time their egg-laying to coincide with one another.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Green turtles time their egg-laying to coincide with one another.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fall,表示"落下,降临"; 2. 引申为偶然发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的;意外的;无意中的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accident[n.意外之事,灾害]+al……的→adj.偶然的;意外的;无意中的
de去掉+cid落+uous……的→使[树叶]掉下→落叶的
ac加强+cid落下,降临+ent→意外的掉下

stems_affixes.value_cn: 落下的方式, 影响范围
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+cid落下+ence表名词→掉下来的概率→发生事件的范围→影响范围
in进入+cid落下+ent→掉进来的事件
co共同+in进入+cid落下+e→共同落进

means.word_mean: 两件或更多的事情 同时发生
想法、意见等 相同；相符；极为类似,一致

sentences.en: Our opinion of the question coincided.
sentences.cn: 对于这个问题, 我们观点一致。

jushi.english: The time of our English class and theirs coincide.
jushi.chinese: 我们的英语课时间和他们的英语课时间一致。

jushi.english: Our ideas on this matter coincide.
jushi.chinese: 我们对这个问题的看法是一致的。
